summary: Provides an abstract interface to MAPDL’s Krylov reduced‑order solver, managing the creation of a Krylov subspace, solving a reduced harmonic problem over a frequency range, and expanding the reduced solution back to the full finite‑element model while handling validation, orthogonality checks, and residual calculations.
business_intent: Accelerate frequency‑domain finite element analyses by reducing the size of the system of equations, thereby decreasing computational cost and time for large models.
